name: SINGLE STICK SLAPPER
description:
EDIT: Thanks to everyone who's played! I'll respond to a couple comments. Updates are coming for things like spawning into a tree or rock. Until then it's HARDCORE MODE. Also, you can't slap anything until you've got your stick! There's a SINGLE stick in each world, keep looking or (R)estart!

Made in 48 hours for the Butterscotch Shenanijam, Single Stick Slapper is a game about surviving the stone age with nothing but your trusty whacking stick!

Use the arrow keys to move, and R to reroll the level. Survive as long as possible for the high score!

Gameplay Trailer: 

The song is "Miniboss Fight [loop]" by Visager, cc-by. Check his stuff at https://visager.bandcamp.com/
